item.title: MFC ACTIVEX GUI DEVELOPER WITH TCP/IP (sunnyvale)
item.description:
Looking for a mid-level SWE for networking security device company. This position is to build a network diagnostics tool for the pre-sales team to use on sales calls to determine problems in a potential clientÂ’s network.
3 year old 100 person company located in Sunnyvale, CA
Requirements:
Knowledge of TCP/IP protocol.
In depth understanding of network applications.
GUI development in Microsoft MFC is required.
GUI development with ActiveX is required.
Web GUI development is a plus.
MS/BS in Computer Science or equiv.
5 years of relevant experience
